nodes.text: Hyrotii Assembly Services was a company that employed Gafferky Lenzwin as a salesbeing during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Lenzwin was sent on a work assignment to Coronet City on the planet Corellia, but risked his career with the company by leaving without a sale in 13 BBY due to health concerns.
Hyrotii Assembly Services was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
